description: Creates a connector between Amazon Web Services Private CA and an Active Directory. You must specify the private CA, directory ID, and security groups.

parameters.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate authority being used.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: Idempotency token. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The identifier of the Active Directory.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: Metadata assigned to a connector consisting of a key-value pair. (string) --- (string) ---

parameters.name: VpcInformation
parameters.description: Information about your VPC and security groups used with the connector. IpAddressType (string) --- The VPC IP address type. The security groups used with the connector. You can use a maximum of 4 security groups with a connector. (string) ---

nested_params.name: SecurityGroupIds
nested_params.description: The security groups used with the connector. You can use a maximum of 4 security groups with a connector.

nested_items.name: ConnectorArn
nested_items.description: If successful, the Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the connector for Active Directory.
